ThingDef.label: bionic eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced artifical eye. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic leg
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial leg. With its biogel nerve-link, powerful mini-servos, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological leg in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine. A biogel nerve bundle runs down an articulated plasteel core, surrounded by a lattice-dust healing system. It matches the performance of a biological spine. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic heart
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial heart. It has synthetic muscle fibers for a realistic heartbeat, plus a high-flow pump for rapid circulation during high stress. It is better than a biological heart in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic stomach
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial stomach. A set of sensors and chemical synthesizers efficiently digest nearly any energy-bearing foodstuff. An integrated lattice-dust healing system automatically repairs any damage caused by the powerful acids. It is better than a biological stomach in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: power claw
ThingDef.description: A combat-oriented hand replacement consisting of a mechanical hand with a vicious claw on each finger. It is vicious in combat, and its powerful mini-servos can crush a skull like a natural hand crushes an egg. The blades can be retracted, making it as useful as a biological hand for non-combat tasks. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial lung. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological lung in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial kidney. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological kidney in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial liver. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic foot
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial foot. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological foot in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic toe
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial toe. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological toe in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic shoulder
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial shoulder. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological shoulder in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic hand
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial hand. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological hand in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic finger
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial finger. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological finger in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial jaw. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological jaw in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic clavicle
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial clavicle. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic sternum
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial sternum. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial pelvis. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic humerus
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial humerus. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic radius
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial radius. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic femur
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial femur. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: bionic tibia
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial tibia. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

ThingDef.label: antitoxin kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial antitoxin kidney. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and toxin filtering system allow it to filter toxin from blood. It is better than a biological kidney in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: medical liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial medical liver. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can secreted more kind of immune system. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: energized liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial energized liver. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can secreted special hormone that make user more energetic. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: power blade
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial power blade. With its biogel nerve-link, lattice-dust healing system, and scyther blade attached to it, it is better than a biological shoulder in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: power arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial power arm. With its biogel nerve-link, lattice-dust healing system, and high blunt damage than normal arm, it is better than a biological arm in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: breathing support rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial breathing support rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can make user breath more ease. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: relaxation rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial relaxation rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can make user feel more relaxed. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: cold regulator rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial cold regulator rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can support blood to regulate cold temperature. Requires special bionics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: heat regulator rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial heat regulator rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can support blood to regulate hot temperature. Requires special bionics research to install it.
